H0.text: Who painted Luncheon of the Boating Party. Claude Monet

H1.text: Who painted Luncheon of the Boating Party. Edgar Degas

H2.text: Who painted Luncheon of the Boating Party. Mary Cassatt

H3.text: Who painted Luncheon of the Boating Party. Renoir

A4.text: Luncheon of the Boating Party is an 1881 painting by French impressionist Pierre-Auguste Renoir.

A5.text: Renoir included several of his friends in Luncheon of the Boating Party.
